entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to snow or ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
